# Introduction

This is a reproduction of the BY2011 Methodology Report. With a few modifications, it can serve as a working version of the BY2015 Methodology Report.

```{r libraries, include = FALSE, message = FALSE, cache = TRUE}
library(inventory)
library(BY2011)
```
